description:
Dominic is a 20 year old cook at a local 24-hour diner.
We spotted him behind the counter during a late-night run for food and asked our waitress to hand him our card. We're glad we did because he contacted us the very next day and we gladly welcomed him as a new Next Door Male.
Dominic is working his way through college where he's studying engineering and is hoping to graduate next year. He's got a girlfriend currently and he says he's very happy with her. Well, we're pretty sure his girlfriend is pretty happy with him, too... well, at least in the bedroom. Watch Dominic in action and you'll see why we think so.
title: Dominic
